code: import{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UserDetails(_ref){let{user}=_ref;const[location,setLocation]=useState(user.location);const[mobileNumber,setMobileNumber]=useState(user.mobileNumber);const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const handleUpdate=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/update-user-details",{userId:user.id,location,mobileNumber});setMessage(response.data.message);}catch(error){setMessage("Failed to update user details.");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md w-full mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6 text-center",children:"User Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"First Name:"})," ",user.firstName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Last Name:"})," ",user.lastName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",user.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"bloodGroup:"})," ",user.bloodGroup]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Mobile Number:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:mobileNumber,onChange:e=>setMobileNumber(e.target.value),className:"border p-2 ml-2"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Location:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:location,onChange:e=>setLocation(e.target.value),className:"border p-2 ml-2"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpdate,className:"mt-4 bg-blue-500 text-white p-2 rounded",children:"Update Details"}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-2 text-red-500",children:message})]});}export default UserDetails;
